price: The disbelieving chiefs of his people said, “If you follow Shu‘ayb, you will certainly be losers[35].”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتُمۡ شُعَيۡبًا إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-mala-u alladhīna kafarū min qawmihi la-ini ittabaʿtum shuʿayban innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
